text: Ki saim' alaha tom binam kise hora nu (phaisala karana vala) jaja banavam. Halanki usa ne tuhade vala sapasata kitaba utari hai. Ate jinham lokam nu asim pahilam kitaba diti si. Uha janade hana ki iha tere raba valom saca'i nala utari ga'i hai. Isa la'i tusim sakam karana vali'am vica samila na hona
